title: Fight the Germs: Why wash hands and social distance?
description: 2020 Lockdown has truly changed the way in which we live our day-to-day lives, disrupting health, work, and social activities. While it is a confusing and uncertain time for us as adults, one can only imagine what it must be like for the children who cannot quite grasp the severity of the situation.* When will they next see their friends and have birthday parties?* When will they be able to play in the park again?* What about meeting their family?* Why do they have to wash their hands so frequently?Comfort your child and carefully answer all of their questions by using the easy-to-follow story in this book. Let them know what is going on in the world, keeping them safe without leaving them scared. This story is designed to promote positivity, knowledge, and hope for your young ones.Get it now to have a healthy conversation with your children.
author: Divya Mohan
